#include <cstdlib>
#include <iostream>
#include <math.h>

using namespace std;

double quadsolver(int a, int b, int c)
{
 	  double SquareRoot = sqrt ((b*b)-4*a*c);
 	  cout << " " << endl;
 	  double answer = (-b + SquareRoot)/(2*a);
 	  cout << "x = ";
 	  cout << answer;
 	  answer = (-b - SquareRoot)/(2*a);
 	  cout << " or ";
 	  cout << answer << endl;
}

int main(int argc, char *argv[])
{
 	int a, b, c;
 	double quad;
 	cout << "This program will solve a quadratic equation." << endl << "First you must rearange it into the form ax^2 + bx + c, then enter tha values of a, b and c when prompted" << endl;
 	cout << " " << endl;
 	cout << "Please enter an integer for a ";
 	cin >> a;
 	cout << "Please enter an integer for b ";
 	cin >> b;
 	cout << "Please enter an integer for c ";
 	cin >> c;
 	quad = quadsolver(a, b, c);
 	cout << " " << endl;
    system("PAUSE");
    return EXIT_SUCCESS;
}
